predicate.note: Frames file for 'reinstate' based on sentences in financial subcorpus and automatic expansion via verbnet.

example.name: just transitive
example.text: ``All our efforts are now focused on improving earnings to the point where we can fund additional new-country development, continue to invest in the business and reinstate the dividend,'' he added.

example.name: odd kind of attribute
example.text: CMS ENERGY Corp. said management would recommend to its board today that its common stock dividend be reinstated *trace* at a ``modest level'' later this year.

example.name: more typical attribute
example.text: John was reinstated *trace* as Mary's best friend after he gave her flowers.
